article.title: What's new in jEdit 4.5
article.para: Detailed changes can always be found in the Detailed Change Log, but here are some of the major features of this version.

listitem.para: Edit using Elastic tabstops, set from Global Options - Editing, Buffer Options, or via buffer-local properties.
Lots of old deprecated APIs were removed. Some plugins may be broken as a result.
Choose color ordering for subpixel antialiasing (Global Options - Text Area - Anti-Aliased Smoothed Text)
